remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RetrieveSurroundingHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RetrieveSurroundingHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RetrieveSurroundingHandler is removed from the event.
